aalinkadreport.description: Acceptable Ads link message on ad report page
aalinkadreport.message: Ketahui lebih lanjut mengenai program iklan yang dapat diterima.

aamessageadreport.description: Acceptable Ads message on ad report page
aamessageadreport.message: Jika Anda lebih tidak suka melihat iklan seperti ini, Anda dapat mematikan daftar filter iklan yang dapat diterima.

ab_filters_subscription_lastDownload_che.description: Filter lists tab of the Options page: Corrupted filter list file.

ab_filters_subscription_lastDownload_con.description: Filter lists tab of the Options page: Generic filter list download error message.

ab_filters_subscription_lastDownload_inv.description: Filter lists tab of the Options page: Invalid filter list file.
ab_filters_subscription_lastDownload_inv.message: Failed, not a valid filters list

ab_filters_subscription_lastDownload_inv.description: Filter lists tab of the Options page: Message when you subscribe to a non-list URL.

acceptable_ads_content_blocking_disbled_.description: Warning shown when Safari Content Blocking is enabled while the Acceptable Ads filter list was already enabled.
acceptable_ads_content_blocking_disbled_.message: We unsubscribed you from Acceptable Ads because you turned on Safari Content Blocking. You can only select one at a time. ([[Why?]])

acceptable_ads_privacy.description: The text of an Acceptable Ads sub-option in the General tab
acceptable_ads_privacy.message: Only allow ads without third-party tracking

acceptableadsdisable_done.description: Message shown to users after disabling Acceptable Ads via the Options page.
acceptableadsdisable_done.message: You're no longer subscribed to the Acceptable Ads filter list.

acceptableadsdisable_how_to_reenable.description: Message shown to users after disabling Acceptable Ads via the Options page.
acceptableadsdisable_how_to_reenable.message: You can turn this back on and support the websites you love by selecting "Allow some non-intrusive advertising" below.

acceptableadsoption.description: Checkbox on the 'General' tab of the Options page to enable the Acceptable Ads filter list
acceptableadsoption.message: Izinkan beberapa iklan yang tidak mengganggu

ad_report_please.description: Link to the ad report page on AdBlock's help site. This is found on the Support tab of the options.
ad_report_please.message: Jika Anda melihat iklan, jangan membuat laporan bug, melainkan buatlah [[laporan iklan]]!

adalreadyblocked.description: On the ad report page, telling the user there is nothing to do as the ad they were seeing is now blocked.

adblock_click_for_details.description: Tooltip on the AdBlock button, to help users understand that they can click the button to access more options.

adblock_facebook.description: Title for link to AdBlock's Facebook account

adblock_twitter.description: Title for link to AdBlock's Twitter account

adblock_website.description: Title for link to AdBlock's website

adblock_wont_run_on_pages_matching.description: Message displayed when the whitelist wizard will whitelist part of an entire website, for example '*.google.com/reader/*'.  The URL will appear on the next line.
adblock_wont_run_on_pages_matching.message: AdBlock tidak akan berjalan pada halaman yang sama dengan:

adblockinglist.description: Subtitle on the Filter lists tab: List of filter lists to block ads.

adblockprotectenrollmentbutton.description: The text of the button in the menu item in the popup menu for AdBlock Protect extension.  Will automatically be converted to all uppercase

adblockprotectenrollmenttext.description: The text of the menu item in the popup menu that takes users for the AdBlock Protect extension
adblockprotectenrollmenttext.message: Keep your personal information safe with AdBlock Protect

adblockreportinganad.description: Title of the ad report page

adblocksupport.description: Title of the Support tab of the Options page

adreport_all_debug_info.description: Shows the user the debug information that will be sent along with their report.
adreport_all_debug_info.message: The following information will also be included in the ad report.

adreport_email.description: Label for a textbox where the user enters their email address to submit a bug or ad report.

adreport_email_privacy.description: Let the user know that their email address won't be used for reasons other than contacting them about their bug or ad report.
adreport_email_privacy.message: We'll only use this to contact you if we need more information.

adreport_filter.description: Optional question on the ad report page when the ad needs to be reported to AdBlock.
adreport_filter.message: If you have created a working filter using the "block an ad" wizard, paste it in the box below:

adreport_laststep.description: Subtitle on the ad report page. Shown when the ad needs to be reported to AdBlock, and not filter list maintainers.
adreport_laststep.message: Last step: report the issue to us.

adreport_location.description: Question on the ad report page asking the user to describe the ad and its location on a webpage.
adreport_location.message: Exactly where on that page is the ad? What does it look like?

adreport_missing_info.description: Error message shown when the user doesn't enter anything in some of the text fields.
adreport_missing_info.message: Required information is missing or invalid.  Please fill in the questions that have a red border.

adreport_missing_screenshot.description: Error message shown when the user doesn't attach a screenshot to an ad report.
adreport_missing_screenshot.message: You forgot to attach a screenshot! We can't help you without seeing the ad(s) you're reporting.

adreport_name.description: Label for a textbox where the user enters their name (or nickname) to submit a bug or ad report.

adreport_response_file_name.description: Error message shown when the file name of an attachement the user is trying to submit in a report is longer than 255 characters.
adreport_response_file_name.message: That file name is too long. Please give your file a shorter name.

adreport_response_invalid_file.description: Error message shown when the user uploads an invalid file type.
adreport_response_invalid_file.message: That's not an image file. Please upload a .png, .gif, or .jpg file.

adreport_response_large_file.description: Error message shown when the user tries to upload a large image file.
adreport_response_large_file.message: That file is too big. Please make sure your file is less than 10 MB.

adreport_response_save_error.description: Error message shown when the server could not save an attached file.

adreport_response_success.description: Shown when a ticket has been sumbitted to AdBlock's support site successfully.
adreport_response_success.message: All set! We'll be in touch as soon as we can. In the meantime, look for an email from AdBlock. You'll find a link to your ticket on our help site there, along with some self-help suggestions if we can't get back to you right away.

adreport_screen_cap_upload.description: Label next to a file upload button.

adreport_server_response_error__manual_m.description: Error message shown when the server has an unrecoverable error during the submission of an ad or bug report.
Error message shown when the server has an unrecoverable error during the submission of an ad or bug report.
adreport_server_response_error__manual_m.message: And manually create a ticket, and copy and paste the information below into the "Fill in any details you think will help us understand your issue" section.

adreport_server_response_error_msg.description: Error message shown when an new ticket is sumbitted for an ad or bug report, and the server had an issue while processing the data.
adreport_server_response_error_msg.message: There was an error processing your request.

adreportintro.description: Introduction of the ad reporting page
adreportintro.message: Menemukan sebuah iklan pada halaman web? Kami akan membantu Anda menemukan tempat yang tepat untuk melaporkannya!

adreportthanks.description: Message to the user thanking them for sharing the URL with us.

adreportvoluntary.description: Introduction of the ad reporting page
adreportvoluntary.message: Melaporkan iklan bersifat sukarela. Hal ini membantu orang lain dengan mengaktifkan pengelola daftar filter untuk memblokir iklan untuk semua orang. Jika Anda tidak merasa altruistik sekarang ini, tidak apa-apa. Tutup halaman ini dan [[blok iklan]] hanya untuk diri sendiri.

advanced_options2.description: Checkbox on the 'General' tab of the Options page
advanced_options2.message: Saya pengguna tingkat lanjut, perlihatkan pilihan tingkat lanjut

all_youtube_channels_complete.description: Alert displayed after the whitelisting of all subscribed YouTube channels has been completed
all_youtube_channels_complete.message: All of your YouTube™ channel subscriptions have been whitelisted

allow_ads_all_youtube_channels.description: Toolbar button menu entry, displayed only on youtube.com/feed/subscriptions and if the YouTube channel whitelisting option is enabled
allow_ads_all_youtube_channels.message: Allow ads on all subscribed YouTube™ channels

allow_whitelisting_youtube_channels.description: Checkbox on the 'General' tab of the Options page
allow_whitelisting_youtube_channels.message: Membolehkan akses kanal YouTube™ tertentu (memerlukan restart browser Anda)

allow_whitelisting_youtube_channels2.description: Checkbox on the 'General' tab of the Options page
allow_whitelisting_youtube_channels2.message: Allow whitelisting of specific YouTube™ channels

apply_theme.description: Text of clickable element that applies the theme of a theme box in the Themes tab of the Options page

betalabel.description: Label for experimental features in AdBlock Options

blacklistclickmessage.description: 'Hide a section of a webpage' part on the Customize tab of the Options page.
blacklistclickmessage.message: Klik kanan sebuah iklan pada halaman untuk memblokirnya -- atau blokir secara manual disini.

blacklisterattrwillbe.description: Checkbox label for attributes in 'Block an ad' wizard.

blacklisterblockedelement.description: Tells the user what the blocked element is on the 'Block an ad' wizard.

blacklisterblocksalloftype.description: Warns the user that all elements of type X will be blocked.
blacklisterblocksalloftype.message: Hati hati: Filter ini memblokir semua $elementtype$ elemen yang ada di halaman!

blacklistereditfilter.description: Text if the user wants to manually edit a filter. 'OK' is the standard JavaScript popup button text.
blacklistereditfilter.message: Silahkan ketik filter yang benar di bawah ini dan tekan OK

blacklistereditinvalid1.description: Alert if the manually edited filter is invalid. Error messages are not translated.

blacklistermatches.description: Tells the user multiple matches were found
blacklistermatches.message: $matchcount$ item yang sama pada halaman ini.

blacklisternofilter.description: Warning if the user hasn't specified a filter

blacklisternotsure.description: 'Block an ad' wizard attribute choice page

blacklisteroptions1.description: 'Block an ad' wizard attribute choice page
blacklisteroptions1.message: Apa yang anda pikir benar tentang iklan ini setiap anda mengunjungi halaman ini?

blacklisteroptionstitle.message: Langkah terakhir: Apa yang membuat hal ini sebagai iklan?

blacklistersinglematch.description: Tells the user only one match was found
blacklistersinglematch.message: 1 item yang sama pada halaman ini.

blacklisterthefilter.description: 'Block an ad' wizard attribute choice page
blacklisterthefilter.message: Filter, yang bisa diubah di halaman pengaturan:

blacklisterwarningnofilter.description: Warns the user that nothing will be blocked.
blacklisterwarningnofilter.message: Perhatian: tidak ada filter yang ditentukan!

block_ads_on_youtube.description: Label for checkbox letting user choose whether to block ads on youtube.com

block_an_ad_on_this_page.description: Toolbar button menu entry and context menu entry
block_an_ad_on_this_page.message: Blok sebuah iklan pada halaman ini

block_annonyances_on_youtube.description: Checkbox letting user choose whether to block annoyances on youtube.com (such as comments, suggested videos, annotations, and recommended channels)

block_privacy_on_youtube.description: Checkbox letting user choose whether to block privacy-related requests on youtube.com

block_this_ad.description: Toolbar button menu entry and context menu entry

blockanadtitle.description: Title of the first two dialogs of the 'Block an ad' wizard

blockdomain.description: Message of the URL and CSS blocking sections

blocked_ads.description: Title for toolbar icon menu section showing number of ads blocked

blocked_n_in_total.description: Shown below the 'Blocked ads:' message. Shows the number of ads blocked since AdBlock was installed. $count$ will be a number between 1 and 999,999,999.

blocked_n_on_this_page.description: Shown below the 'Blocked ads:' message. Shows the number of ads blocked on this page. $count$ will be a number between 1 and 999.

blockurlwithtext.description: Message of the URL-blocking section (Block an ad by its URL) on the Customize tab
blockurlwithtext.message: Blok URL yang mengandung teks ini

browserestartrequired.description: Displayed after disabling Safari Content Blocking, which requres a browser relaunch.
browserestartrequired.message: Please restart Safari to finish turning off content blocking.

bugreport.description: Link to send a bug report on the Support tab
bugreport.message: Why don't you send us a [[bug report]]?

buttonexclude.description: Button for excluding a domain in the whitelist wizard

buttonlooksgood.description: Confirmation button after user chose what to block on the page

callout_new_feature.description: Text to callout a new feature

cantblockflash.description: Result of the final ad report question
cantblockflash.message: Kami belum bisa memblokir iklan iklan didalam Flash dan plugin lainnya. Kami menunggu dukungan dari browser dan WebKit.

cantblockflashwarning.description: Text of the final ad report question
cantblockflashwarning.message: Apakah iklannya muncul didalam atau sebelum film atau plugin lainnya seperti game Flash?

catchannelswitchlabel.description: The label text for the cat switch on the MyAdBlock Options page

changes_to_adblock.description: Link to Options page with more information about the changes.

check_email.description: Prompt the user to check their email for a message from AdBlock

checkinfirefox_1.description: instruction for how to check Firefox for a reported ad
checkinfirefox_1.message: Pasang Firefox jika anda tidak memilikinya.

checkinfirefox_2.description: Instruction for how to check Firefox for a reported ad. Don't translate the name 'Adblock Plus'.
checkinfirefox_2.message: Pasang AdBlock Plus untuk Firefox jika Anda tidak memilikinya.

checkinfirefox_3.description: Instruction for how to check Firefox/Chrome for a reported ad
checkinfirefox_3.message: Di peramban itu, berlangganan ke daftar filter yang sama seperti yang Anda miliki di sini.

checkinfirefox_4.description: Instruction for how to check Firefox/Chrome for a reported ad
checkinfirefox_4.message: Pada browser tersebut, muatlah halaman yang ada iklannya.

checkinfirefox_5.description: Instruction for how to check Firefox/Chrome for a reported ad
checkinfirefox_5.message: Apakah iklannya muncul juga pada browser itu?

checkinfirefoxorchrome_1.description: instruction for how to check Firefox or Chrome for a reported ad
checkinfirefoxorchrome_1.message: Install Firefox or Chrome if you don't have it.

checkinfirefoxorchrome_2.description: Instruction for how to check Firefox/Chrome for a reported ad. Don't translate the name 'Adblock Plus'.
checkinfirefoxorchrome_2.message: Install Adblock Plus for Firefox or AdBlock for Chrome if you don't have it.

checkinfirefoxorchrometitle.description: Tell a user to see if a reported ad also appears in Firefox/Chrome

checkinfirefoxtitle.description: Tell a user to see if a reported ad also appears in Firefox

chromebutton_how_to_hide2.description: Message explaining how to hide the AdBlock toolbar button. 'Hide Button' should match the text that Chrome displays when you right click a toolbar button.
chromebutton_how_to_hide2.message: Right-click the AdBlock button and select 'Hide in Chrome Menu'. To show it, click the Chrome menu, right-click the AdBlock button, and select 'Keep in Toolbar'.

cleanuplist2.description: Label at the bottom of the 'Customize' tab of the Options page

clickdisableaa.message: Klik ini: [[Nonaktifkan Iklan Yang Dapat Diterima]]

clickdisableotherextensions.description: On the ad report page, an alternative way to disable other extensions
clickdisableotherextensions.message: ATAU, cukup klik tombol ini untuk kita untuk melakukan semua hal di atas: [[Nonaktifkan semua ekstensi lainnya]]

clickthead.description: User has to click the ad they want to block.
clickthead.message: Klik iklannya, dan saya akan menuntun anda memblokirnya.

close.description: Generic message for buttons that close a view or window

confirm_undo_custom_filters.description: Confirmation message when user wants to undo their custom blocks for a domain. $count$ will be a number between 1 and 999,999,999, $host$ will be the domain where the custom blocks will be reset.
confirm_undo_custom_filters.message: Apakah Anda yakin ingin menghapus blok $count$ yang telah Anda buat pada $host$?

contact_support_if_errors_continue.description: Warn the user if they continue to see the same error they should contact AdBlock support.
contact_support_if_errors_continue.message: If you continue to see this error, please contact [[support]].

content_blocking_acceptable_ads_disbled_.description: Warning shown when the Acceptable Ads filter list is enabled while Safari Content Blocking was already enabled.
content_blocking_acceptable_ads_disbled_.message: We turned off Safari Content Blocking because you opted to allow non-intrusive ads. You can only select one at a time. ([[Why?]])

contentblockingwarning.description: Notice shown on the 'Customize' tab of the options page when Safari Content Blocking is enabled
contentblockingwarning.message: Note:  Whitelisting (allowing ads on) a page or site is not supported with Safari Content Blocking enabled.

contributors.description: Link to the contributors page on the Support tab
contributors.message: We've got a page to help you find out the [[people behind AdBlock]], as well!

correctfilters.description: On the ad report page, label describing having the right filter lists enabled
correctfilters.message: Pastikan Anda menggunakan filter bahasa yang tepat:

csstomatch.description: Message of the CSS-hiding section (Hide a section of a webpage) on the Customize tab

custom_filters_migration_error_message_p.description: Part one of a message shown to users on the Customize tab of the Options page after invalid custom filters have been migrated
Part two of a message shown to users on the Customize tab of the Options page after invalid custom filters have been migrated
custom_filters_migration_error_message_p.message: The following message(s) were generated during the custom filter migration (ignore the line numbers):

custom_filters_migration_error_message_p.description: Part three of a message shown to users on the Customize tab of the Options page after invalid custom filters have been migrated

customfilters.description: Subtitle on the Filter lists tab: Section for adding your own filter lists.

customfilterserrormessage.description: Error message when there is an issue with a custom filter on the 'Customize' tab of the Options page

dark_theme.description: Name of a theme in the Themes tab of the Options page

datacollectionoption.description: Checkbox on the 'General' tab of the Options page
datacollectionoption.message: Allow AdBlock to collect anonymous filter list usage data, and information about content blocked by filter lists

debuginfo.description: Users can click this link to provide debug information to AdBlock staff
debuginfo.message: Has our team requested some debug info? Click [[here]] for that!

debuginlogoption.description: Checkbox on the 'General' tab of the Options page
debuginlogoption.message: Show debug statements in Console Log (which slows down the extension)

debuginlogoption2.description: Checkbox on the 'General' tab of the Options page
debuginlogoption2.message: Show debug statements in Console Log

default_theme.description: Name of a theme in the Themes tab of the Options page

delete_migration_error_messages.description: Button to delete error messages when adding custom filters manually

description.description: Extension description in manifest. Should not exceed 132 characters.
description.message: The most popular Chrome extension, with over 60 million users! Blocks ads all over the web.

description2.description: Extension description in manifest. Should not exceed 132 characters.
description2.message: The most popular Chrome extension, with over 60 million users! Blocks ads all over the web.

description_edge.description: Description for the AdBlock for Edge extension. Should not exceed 132 characters.
description_edge.message: AdBlock. The #1 ad blocker with over 200 million downloads. Blocks ads all over the web.

description_yt.description: Description for the AdBlock on YouTube extension. Should not exceed 132 characters.
description_yt.message: The only YouTube™ ad blocker built by AdBlock, the most popular Chrome extension with 60 million users worldwide

devtools_action_block.description: Button text on the dev tools panel.

devtools_action_remove.description: Button text on the dev tools panel.

devtools_action_unblock.description: Button text on the dev tools panel.

devtools_filter_origin_custom.description: sub-title text of the rule showing the source of the rule as custom rules

devtools_filter_origin_none.description: sub-title text of the rule showing the source of the rule as a unamed filter list

devtools_filter_subtitle.description: sub-title text of the rule showing the source of the rule a named filter list

devtools_filter_title.description: Text of the filter that was applied to the list item.

devtools_footer.description: message on the bottom of the panel
devtools_footer.message: <a0>Reload</a0> page to see effect of filter changes

devtools_header.description: Text on the top of the dev tools panel to show all items of any type; slot0 and slot1 are two seperate drop down lists

devtools_header_state_all.description: one of the items in the drop down list in the header of the dev tools panel

devtools_header_state_blocked.description: one of the items in the drop down list in the header of the dev tools panel

devtools_header_state_whitelisted.description: one of the items in the drop down list in the header of the dev tools panel

devtools_header_type_any.description: one of the items in the drop down list in the header of the dev tools panel

devtools_request_subtitle.description: sub title text for the request-column header of the dev tools panel

devtools_request_title.description: title text for the request-column header of the dev tools panel

devtools_request_url.description: sub title text for the request-column of the dev tools panel when the request is rewritten e.g. http://example.com/foo rewritten to http://example.com/bar

disableaa.description: Section header on the ad report page
disableaa.message: Cek filter iklan yang dapat diterima:

disabled_by_filter_lists.description: Message shown when a user tries to unwhitelist a web page that has been whitelisted by a rule in a subscribed filter list.
disabled_by_filter_lists.message: Maaf, AdBlock dimatikan pada halaman ini oleh salah satu daftar filter anda.

disabled_by_filter_lists_yt.description: Message shown when a user tries to un-whitelist a web page that has been whitelisted by a rule in a subscribed filter list. Specific to the 'AdBlock on YouTube' extension.
disabled_by_filter_lists_yt.message: Sorry, AdBlock on YouTube™ is disabled on this page by one of your options.

disabled_on_this_channel.description: Message shown in the toolbar button menu on YouTube channel pages and videos that have been whitelisted.
disabled_on_this_channel.message: You allowed ads on this channel.

disabled_on_this_page.description: Message shown in toolbar button on web pages that have been whitelisted

disableforchromeandsafaristeptwo.description: Step 2 for disabling Chrome and Safari extensions
disableforchromeandsafaristeptwo.message: Hilangkan centang 'Enabled' dipinggir setiap ekstensi kecuali untuk AdBlock. Biarkan AdBlock berjalan.

disableforedgestepone.message: Click the More menu (...) and select Extensions.

disableforedgesteptwo.message: For each extension except for AdBlock, click the gear icon and click the On toggle button to change it to Off.

disableforsafaristepone.message: Klik pada menu Safari > Preferences > Extension.

disableotherextensionscomplete.description: On the ad report page, alert notifying users that we've disabled all other extensions
disableotherextensionscomplete.message: Kami telah dinonaktifkan semua ekstensi lainnya. Sekarang kita akan memuat ulang halaman dengan iklan. Harap tunggu sebentar.

display_language_selector.description: Text shown before language selector drop-down.

dogchannelswitchlabel.description: The label text for the dog switch on the MyAdBlock Options page

domain_pause_adblock.description: Menu entry to pause AdBlock on this domain (stop blocking ads)

domain_unpause_adblock.description: Link text to start blocking ads again, displayed immediately after 'AdBlock is paused on this site'

donate_to_adblock.description: Text of a donate link in the toolbar button menu

donate_to_youtube_adblock.description: Text of a donate link in the toolbar button menu. 'This' refers to the 'AdBlock on YouTube' extension.

dont_run_on_pages_on_domain.description: Menu entry to open the whitelist wizard
dont_run_on_pages_on_domain.message: Jangan jalankan pada halaman-halaman di domain ini

dont_run_on_pages_on_site.description: Menu entry to open the whitelist wizard
dont_run_on_pages_on_site.message: Don't run on pages on this site

dont_run_on_this_page.description: Menu entry to whitelist the current page

download_mac_app.description: Link to download our Mac App. [[ and ]] will be replaced with HTML to link to the Mac App Store
download_mac_app.message: To get the best AdBlock experience on your Mac, please download our [[AdBlock for Safari Mac App!]]

easylist_disable_done.description: Message shown to users after disabling EasyList via the Filter lists tab on the Options page.
easylist_disable_done.message: AdBlock uses EasyList to block ads on most websites.

easylist_disable_how_to_reenable.description: Message shown to users after disabling EasyList via the Filter lists tab on the Options page.
easylist_disable_how_to_reenable.message: We recommend keeping it on. If you unsubscribed by accident, please select "EasyList" now to block more ads.

easylist_lite_disable_done.description: Message shown to users after disabling both EasyList Lite and EasyList via the Filter lists tab on the Options page.
easylist_lite_disable_done.message: AdBlock uses EasyList Lite or EasyList to block ads on most websites.

easylist_lite_disable_how_to_reenable.description: Message shown to users after disabling both EasyList Lite and EasyList via the Filter lists tab on the Options page.
easylist_lite_disable_how_to_reenable.message: We recommend keeping it on. If you unsubscribed by accident, please select "EasyList Lite" or "EasyList" now to block more ads.

easylist_lite_or_easylist.description: Message shown to users after disabling both EasyList Lite and EasyList via the Filter lists tab on the Options page.
easylist_lite_or_easylist.message: We recommend subscribing to either "EasyList Lite" or "EasyList" but not both.

enable_adblock.description: Link text to un-whitelist a page, displayed immediately after 'AdBlock is disabled on this page'

enable_adblock_on_this_channel.description: Menu entry to un-whitelist a YouTube channel, displayed under 'You allowed ads on this channel.'

enable_do_not_track_advice.description: The text advicing to enable DNT if Acceptable Ads is enabled in the General tab
enable_do_not_track_advice.message: For this feature to work properly, please enable Do Not Track (DNT) in your browser preferences.

enableotherextensionscomplete.description: On the ad report page, alert notifying users that we've re-enabled extensions that were previously disabled
enableotherextensionscomplete.message: Ekstensi yang telah dinonaktifkan sebelumnya telah diaktifkan kembali.

englishonly.description: Lets the user know that a link/page is only available in English.

enter_url.description: Placeholder text in the Custom Filter list URL bar

error_msg_header.description: The text on the popup menu when an error has occurred
error_msg_header.message: Oops! We're sorry, the AdBlock menu had trouble loading.

error_msg_help.message: If that doesn't work, check here for more help: Click

error_msg_help_us.message: Help us resolve this problem by sending us some debug data: Click

error_msg_reload.message: Next, try reloading the extension: Click

error_msg_thank_you.description: The text on the popup menu when an error has occurred

excludedomainorurl.description: Message of the exclude section (Show ads on a webpage or domain) on the Customize tab
excludedomainorurl.message: Domain atau URL dimana AdBlock tidak boleh memblokir apapun

failedtofetchfilter.description: Error alert when subscribing to a filter list

fetchinglabel.description: Status label when selecting a new filter list

ff_button_how_to_hide.description: Message explaining how to hide the AdBlock toolbar button. 'Remove from Toolbar' should match the text that Firefox displays when you right click a toolbar button, and 'Customize' should match the text that shows when you click the button on the Firefox toolbar with three lines.
ff_button_how_to_hide.message: Untuk menyembunyikan tombol, klik kanan dan pilih Hapus dari Toolbar.  Anda dapat menunjukkan ini lagi di bawah menu Firefox-> Customize.

ff_checkinchrome_1.description: Instruction for how to check Chrome for a reported ad
ff_checkinchrome_1.message: Pasang Chrome, jika Anda tidak memilikinya.

ff_checkinchrome_2.description: Instruction for how to check Chrome for a reported ad
ff_checkinchrome_2.message: Pasang AdBlock untuk Chrome, jika Anda tidak memilikinya.

ff_checkinchrome_3.description: Instruction for how to check Chrome for a reported ad
ff_checkinchrome_3.message: Di Chrome, berlangganan ke daftar filter yang sama seperti yang Anda miliki di sini.

ff_checkinchrome_4.description: Instruction for how to check Chrome for a reported ad
ff_checkinchrome_4.message: Di Chrome, muat halaman dengan iklan.

ff_checkinchrome_5.description: Instruction for how to check Chrome for a reported ad
ff_checkinchrome_5.message: Apakah iklan muncul di Chrome juga?

ff_checkinchrometitle.description: Tell a user to see if a reported ad also appears in Chrome

filter_annoyances_explained.message: blocks in-page pop-ups, social media and related widgets, and other annoyances

filter_chinese.description: A filter list combined with EasyList

filter_czech.description: A filter list combined with EasyList

filter_dutch.description: A filter list combined with EasyList

filter_easylist_plus_vietnamese.description: A filter list combined with EasyList

filter_elemhideemulation_nodomain.message: Tidak ada domain aktif yang digunakan untuk saringan penyembunyian elemen yang diperpanjang

filter_invalid_domain.message: Domain yang ditetapkan tidak valid (atau kosong)

filter_israeli.description: A filter list combined with EasyList

filter_italian.description: A filter list combined with EasyList

filter_latvian.description: A filter list combined with EasyList

filter_russian.description: A filter list combined with EasyList

filter_snippet_nodomain.message: Tidak ada domain aktif yang ditetapkan untuk potongan penyaring

filter_warning_removal_explained.message: removes warnings about using ad blockers

filterannoyances.message: Fanboy's Annoyances (blocks in-page pop-ups, social media and related widgets, and other annoyances)

filterantisocial.message: Daftar Antisocial filter (hapus tombol social media)

filtereasylist_plus_vietnamese.description: A filter list combined with EasyList

filterlistlink.description: Filter lists tab explanation and link to filter list credits.
filterlistlink.message: Jangan berangganan lebih dari yang anda butuhkan -- setiap satunya akan sedikit memperlambat anda! Kredit dan lebih banyak daftar dapat ditemukan [[Disini]].

filterlistsrock.description: Header text on the Customize tab
filterlistsrock.message: Daftar filter memblokir banyak iklan di web. Anda juga bisa:

filterlistsrock2.description: Header text on the Customize tab
filterlistsrock2.message: The filter lists block most ads on the web. You can also...

filterorigin.description: Resource list page: tooltip of matching filter, telling which filter list contains the filter

list.example: A filter list name OR AdBlock OR the translation of 'tabcustomize'

filterrussian.description: Language names for a filter list

filtersavewarning.message:
Hati hati: jika anda membuat kesalahan disini banyak filter, termasuk filter resmi juga akan rusak!
Baca [[Panduan filter syntax]] untuk belajar bagaimana menambah filter daftar hitam dan daftar putih yang lebih maju.

filtersavewarning_part1.description: Warning when manually editing filters -- first part not clickable.
filtersavewarning_part1.message: Be careful: if you make a mistake here a lot of other filters, including the official filters, could get broken too!

filtersavewarning_part2.description: Warning when manually editing filters -- second part clickable.
filtersavewarning_part2.message: Read the [[filter syntax tutorial]] to learn how to add advanced blacklist and whitelist filters.

filtersavewarning_ytadblock_1.description: First part of the warning when manually editing filters in the 'AdBlock on YouTube' extension.
filtersavewarning_ytadblock_1.message: Be careful: if you make a mistake here, AdBlock on YouTube™ could stop working properly.

filtersavewarning_ytadblock_2.description: Second part of the warning when manually editing filters in the 'AdBlock on YouTube' extension.
filtersavewarning_ytadblock_2.message: Read the [[filter syntax tutorial]] to learn how to add whitelist filters.

filterstabtitle.description: Title of the Filter lists tab of the Options page

filterviewsource.description: Title for links to view filter lists on website

filterwarning_removal.description: A filter list. "Adblock" is written with a lowercase B in this string as it refers to ad blocking extensions in general, not just AdBlock specifically.
filterwarning_removal.message: Adblock Warning Removal list (removes warnings about using ad blockers)

filterwarning_removal2.description: A filter list. "Adblock" is written with a lowercase B in this string as it refers to ad blocking extensions in general, not just AdBlock specifically.

firefox_explanation.description: Explanation of the 'Check in Firefox or Chrome' step on the ad report page
firefox_explanation.message: Tujuan dari pertanyaan ini adalah untuk menentukan siapa yang harus menerima laporan anda. Jika anda menjawab pertanyaan dengan salah, laporannya akan terkirim kepada orang yang salah, jadi mungkin laporan anda akan diabaikan.

fixityourself.description: Telling users who won't report an ad to us how to handle it for themselves
fixityourself.message: OK, anda tetap bisa memblokir iklan ini untuk anda sendiri pada halaman pengaturan, Terima kasih!

flashads.description: Title of the final ad report question if the ad didn't appear in Firefox

format_site1_site2_site3.description: Example showing users how to input a list of sites on the Customize tab. You can translate the 'news' and 'siteN' but leave the '|'s and '~'s in place.

framedomain.description: Resource list page: domain name of the frame

frametype.description: Resource list page: followed by frame type (top frame, subframe)

frameurl.description: Resource list page: full URL of the frame

generaloptions.description: Title of the first Options page tab

generaloptions2.description: Title of one of the Options page tabs

header.description: Text in theme box of the Themes tab of the Options page (no more than 10 characters)

headerfilter.description: Resource list page: title of a column

headerresource.description: Resource list page: title of a column

headertype.description: Resource list page: title of a column

help_and_feedback.description: Text of a help link in the toolbar button menu

hide_this_button.description: Toolbar button menu entry to hide the AdBlock button

how.description: Text of a link pointing to instructions on how to do something

image_swap.description: Title of the Image Swap sub-tab of the Options page

images_coming_soon.description: The text telling MyAdBlock active users that there will be more photos for MyAdBlock.

invalidListUrl.description: Message when you subscribe to a non-list URL
invalidListUrl.message: Daftar URL yang tidak sah. Daftar ini akan dihapus.

issueReporter_anonymousSubmission_warnin.message: Kami tidak dapat menghubungi Anda kembali dan akan menurunkan prioritas laporan ini.

issueReporter_comment_description.message: Kotak teks di bawah ini memungkinkan Anda untuk memasukkan komentar untuk membantu kami memahami masalah. Langkah ini adalah pilihan tetapi dianjurkan jika masalahnya tidak jelas. Anda juga dapat memeriksa data laporan sebelum dikirim.

issueReporter_confirmationMessage.message: Laporan Anda telah disimpan. Anda dapat mengaksesnya pada alamat berikut:

issueReporter_email_description.message: Kami menganjurkan Anda untuk memasukkan alamat email yang valid sehingga kami dapat menghubungi Anda jika terdapat pertanyaan tentang laporan Anda. Ini juga akan memungkinkan kami untuk mengetahui kontribusi Anda dan meninggikan prioritas.

issueReporter_errorMessage.message: Upaya mengirimkan laporan gagal dengan kode kesalahan "?1?". Silahkan pastikan Anda terhubung ke Internet dan coba kembali. Jika masalah berlanjut, silahkan meminta bantuan pada [link]Forum AdBlock[/link].

issueReporter_falseNegative_description.message: Pilih opsi ini jika suatu iklan tetap muncul meski AdBlock telah diaktifkan.

issueReporter_falsePositive_description.message: Pilih opsi ini jika halaman tersebut telah kehilangan konten penting, ditampilkan dengan tidak tepat, atau tidak berfungsi sebagaimana mestinya. Anda dapat memastikan apakah AdBlock yang menyebabkan permasalahan tersebut dengan menonaktifkannya untuk sementara.

issueReporter_knownIssueMessage.message: Masalah yang Anda laporkan mungkin sudah dikenal. Informasi selanjutnya:

issueReporter_sending.message: Silahkan tunggu sementara AdBlock mengirimkan laporan Anda.

issueReporter_typeSelector_description.message: Jendela ini akan memandu Anda melewati langkah-langkah yang diperlukan untuk mengirimkan laporan permasalahan AdBlock. Pertama, silakan pilih jenis permasalahan yang Anda alami di halaman ini:

landscapechannelswitchlabel.description: The label text for the Landscape switch on the MyAdBlock Options page

languagedropdowndescription.description: Dropdown list for language-specific filter lists

learn_more.description: Link to Knowledge Base article with more information about the settings change

legend.description: Resource list page: followed by color codes for various resource statuses (blocked, whitelisted, hidden)

linkunblock.message: Perlihatkan iklan pada sebuah halama atau domain

loading.description: Generic message displayed during processes that take some time

local_cdn_option.description: Option to let the user enable Local CDN feature.
local_cdn_option.message: Enable local content caching for popular website libraries

mac_app_message_menu_part_one.description: part one of the message to safari users on the popup menu

mac_app_message_menu_part_two.description: part two of the message to safari users on the popup menu

mac_app_message_options.description: Message to users on the Options page
mac_app_message_options.message: AdBlock for Safari is now available as a Mac app!

malwarecheck.description: Section header on the ad report page
malwarecheck.message: Cek perangkat lunak jahat yang dapat menyuntikkan iklan:

malwarenotfound.description: On the ad report page, the ads the user is seeing are probably not caused by malware/adware
malwarenotfound.message: Tidak ada malware yang diketahui ditemukan.

malwarenotificationcheckboxmessage.description: Checkbox displayed when subscribing to the 'Malware protection' filter list on the Filter lists tab of the Options page
malwarenotificationcheckboxmessage.message: Haruskah AdBlock memberitahu Anda ketika mendeteksi malware?

malwarenotificationdisablethesemessages.description: Button on the malware notification to disable future notifications. Message should be under 45 characters!

malwarenotificationlearnmore.description: Button on the malware notification that opens a page about malware on the AdBlock website. Message should be under 45 characters!

malwarenotificationmessage.description: Notification when a potential malware request has been blocked. This message should be under 90 characters!
malwarenotificationmessage.message: AdBlock telah memblokir unduhan dari situs terkenal akan host malware.

malwarewarning.description: On the ad report page, the ads the user is seeing might be caused by malware/adware
malwarewarning.message: Komputer Anda mungkin terinfeksi oleh malware. Klik [[di sini]] untuk informasi lebih lanjut.

manualfilteredit_yt.description: Subtitle on the 'General' tab of AdBlock on YouTube

manuallyenableotherextensions.description: On the ad report page, alert notifying users that they will need to manually reenable the extensions
manuallyenableotherextensions.message: Buka laman ekstensi untuk mngaktifkan ekstensi yang telah dinonaktifkan sebelumnya.

migration_error_message.description: Error when adding custom filters manually
migration_error_message.message: We've found some errors in your custom filters. See below for the messages.

modifydomain.description: Caption for the whitelist wizard slider that modifies the domain part of a URL

modifypath.description: Caption for the whitelist wizard slider that modifies the path part of a URL

more_themes_coming_soon.description: Text in theme box of the Themes tab of the Options page (no more than 60 characters)
more_themes_coming_soon.message: Check back soon, more themes are on the way!

more_themes_on_the_way.description: Text in theme box of the Themes tab of the Options page (no more than 60 characters)

myadblock_benefits_explained.description: Main text of the teaser MyAdBlock feature in the MyAdBlock tab of the Options page
myadblock_benefits_explained.message: In exchange for supporting us by enabling MyAdBlock, you'll get access to the latest tools and features as soon as they're released.

myadblock_enrollment_hide_forever.description: The label for a checkbox that will hide the enrollment box forever.

myadblock_enrollment_link_info.description: Explains what happens when clicking the magic link.
myadblock_enrollment_link_info.message: Clicking the link makes it easy to set up MyAdBlock in other Chrome browsers.

myadblock_enrollment_resend_button.description: Text on the MyAdBlock enrollment resend email button

myadblock_enrollment_resend_error.description: MyAdBlock license email failed to send error message.
myadblock_enrollment_resend_error.message: There was a problem resending your confirmation email.

myadblock_enrollment_resend_success.description: MyAdBlock license email successfully sent message.
myadblock_enrollment_resend_success.message: We sent a magic link to $email$.

myadblock_enrollment_success.message: You can use the magic link in your confirmation email to unlock MyAdBlock in other Chrome browsers.

myadblock_enrollment_title.description: The title of the MyAdBlock enrollment box.
myadblock_enrollment_title.message: MyAdBlock is set up on this browser!

myadblock_feedback_button.description: Text on the MyAdBlock feedback button

myadblock_feedback_info.description: Text describing the MyAdBlock feedback call to action.
myadblock_feedback_info.message: If you have any feedback or feature requests for us, please use our feedback page.

myadblock_feedback_title.description: Title for MyAdBlock feedback call to action.
myadblock_feedback_title.message: We'd love to hear from you!

myadblock_more_coming_soon.description: Title of the teaser MyAdBlock feature box in the MyAdBlock tab of the Options page

myadblock_options_page_header.description: The text of the header the MyAdBlock Options page

myadblock_payment_not_available_callout.description: The text notifying something is wrong in the payment iframe in the Options page.

myadblock_payment_not_available_subtitle.description: The sub-title of an error message box in payment iframe in the Options page.
myadblock_payment_not_available_subtitle.message: We were unable to connect to our servers

myadblock_payment_not_available_text.description: The text of an error message box in the MyAdBlock tab in option page when we cannot load iframe.
myadblock_payment_not_available_text.message: We’re so glad you are interested in MyAdBlock! Unfortunately, we can’t process payments at this time. Please try again later.

myadblock_payment_not_available_title.description: The title of an error message box in the MyAdBlock tab in option page when we cannot load iframe.
myadblock_payment_not_available_title.message: OH NO! We were unable to connect to our servers

myadblock_pic_replacemenet_description.description: The text briefly describing what the feature does in the MyAdBlock tab in the option page.
myadblock_pic_replacemenet_description.message: Replace ads with images you love

myadblock_picreplacement_exlained.description: The label text for the switch on the MyAdBlock Options page
myadblock_picreplacement_exlained.message: Select from the categories below and AdBlock will occasionally replace ads with high-quality images to brighten your day.

myadblock_short_description.description: Text substitle of myAdBlock page in the options page
myadblock_short_description.message: Experience an enhanced AdBlock with fun new features exclusively for donors

myadblock_subscribe_invite.description: Text on hover of a locked MyAdBlock feature in the MyAdBlock tab of the Options page

myadblock_sync_description.description: Text on the MyAdBlock tab, Sync panel of the Options page
myadblock_sync_description.message: Sync your preferences across multiple browsers and devices

myadblock_themes_description.description: Text briefly describing what themes do on the MyAdBlock tab of the Options page
myadblock_themes_description.message: Change the way AdBlock looks, including font size and color scheme

myadblockenrollment.description: The text of the menu item in the popup menu that takes you to the MyAdBlock Enrollment page

myadblockoptions.description: The text of the menu item in the popup menu that takes you to the MyAdBlock Options page

myadblockoptionscategoryheader.description: The text of the header the MyAdBlock Options page

myadblockoptionspageheader.description: The text of the header the MyAdBlock Options page

myadblockpicreplacementswitchlabel.description: The label text for the switch on the MyAdBlock Options page
myadblockpicreplacementswitchlabel.message: Replace some blocked ads with high-quality images from the categories below

name_adblock_on_youtube.description: Name of version of the AdBlock extension that only blocks ads on YouTube. Other strings that refer to the 'AdBlock on YouTube' extension should use this name.

name_devbuild.description: Extension name to be shown for development builds. Note: this cannot be longer than 45 characters. Should not be translated

name_releasebuild.description: Extension name to be shown for release / published builds.  Should not be translated

new_badge.description: DO NOT TRANSLATE. Max 4 characters. Text in the badge of our extension toolbar icon.

new_cta_default_text.description: Text of a temporary call-to-action item in the popup menu.

new_cta_hovered_text.description: Text of a temporary call-to-action hovered item in the popup menu.

new_myadblock_feature_available.description: The text in the popup menu item saying there is a new MyAdBlock feature and takes you to the MyAdBlock tab in the option page.
new_myadblock_feature_available.message: Click here to unlock new features!

new_resourcelist_explanation_osx.description: Message explaining how to access the resource list page on AdBlock 3.0+ (Mac)
new_resourcelist_explanation_osx.message: To show all requests, right click the page, select 'Inspect' (Option+Cmd+I), then select the 'AdBlock' tab.

new_resourcelist_explanation_win.description: Message explaining how to access the resource list page on AdBlock 3.0+ (Windows)
new_resourcelist_explanation_win.message: To show all requests, right click the page, select 'Inspect' (Ctrl+Shift+I), then select the 'AdBlock' tab.

newmyadblockenrollment.description: The text of the 'Enable MyAdBlock' menu item in the popup menu that takes you to the MyAdBlock Enrollment page

no.description: A negative response to a question

nodefaultfilter1.description: Instructions on ad report page pointing users to EasyList subscriptions list.
nodefaultfilter1.message:
We don't have a default filter list for that language.
Please [[try to find a suitable list that supports this language]] or block this ad for yourself via the AdBlock menu.

noresourcessend2.message: Something went wrong. No resources have been sent through. This page will now close. Try reloading the website.

note.description: Indicates that the user should take note of the message that follows.

notification_antiadblock_message.message: Situs ini telah diketahui sering menampilkan pesan yang ditargetkan untuk pengguna AdBlock. Apakah Anda ingin Adblick Plus untuk menyembunyikan pesan yang ditargetkan tersebut?

notification_open_all.message: Buka semua tautan dari pemberitahuan ini

notification_with_buttons.message: Klik 'OK' untuk membuka semua link pada pemberitahuan ini.

notification_without_buttons.message: Klik pada pemberitahuan untuk membuka semua link di dalamnya.

ocean_theme.description: Name of a theme in the Themes tab of the Options page

one_moment_all_youtube_channels.description: Alert displayed when whitelisting all subscribed YouTube channels
one_moment_all_youtube_channels.message: Harap tunggu sebentar kami sedang mengumpulkan semua langganan Anda

only_block_ads_on_these_sites.description: Label for textbox where user enters a list of sites on Customize tab
only_block_ads_on_these_sites.message: Hanya blokir iklan di situs-situs ini:

operabutton_how_to_hide2.description: Message explaining how to hide the AdBlock toolbar button. 'Hide Button' should match the text that Opera displays on the Extensions page.
operabutton_how_to_hide2.message: Untuk menyembunyikan tombol, pergi ke opera://extensions dan centang opsi 'Hide from toolbar'. Anda dapat menampilkannya lagi dengan tidak mencentang opsi tersebut.

options.description: The text of the link on chrome://chrome/extensions that takes you to the Options page

options_page_theme.description: Section title of the Themes tab of the Options page

optionstitle_yt.description: Title for the Options page for the 'AdBlock on YouTube' extension.

orenteraurl.description: Text box to enter a link to a custom filter list

otherfilters.description: Subtitle on the Filter lists tab: List of filter lists to block other elements that are not ads.

pagelanguagecheck.message: Ditulis dalam bahasa apa halaman itu?

pause_adblock.description: Menu entry to pause AdBlock (stop blocking ads)

pause_adblock_everywhere.description: Menu entry to pause AdBlock everywhere (stop blocking ads)

pause_adblocking.description: Menu entry to pause the extension (stop blocking ads)

please_try_again.description: Prompt the user to retry the last action.

popup_menu_theme.description: Section title of the Themes tab of the Options page

pwyw.description: Text of a payment request link

pwyw2.description: Text of a payment request link

rebecca_purple_theme.description: Name of a theme in the Themes tab of the Options page

reenableadsonebyone.description: Tells the user to re-enable the extensions one by one
reenableadsonebyone.message: Hebat! Sekarang mari kita menemukan ekstensi yang adalah penyebab. Pergi dan aktifkan ekstensi setiap satu per satu. Ekstensi yang membawa kembali iklan adalah yang Anda butuhkan untuk dihapus untuk menyingkirkan iklan.

refusetocheck.description: User is telling us they don't wish to investigate something for us
refusetocheck.message: Saya tidak ingin memeriksa hal ini

reloadadpage.message: Muat ulang halaman yang ada iklannya.

removefromlist.description: Label to remove a custom filter list

report_ad_on_page.description: Entry in the AdBlock button menu
report_ad_on_page.message: Laporkan sebuah iklan pada halaman ini

reportfilterlistproblem.description: Telling the user to report an ad to a filter list maintainer
reportfilterlistproblem.message: Ini adalah sebuah masalah daftar filter. Laporkan disini: $link$

link.example: The link could point to a filter list's forum, or to the email address of a filter list maintainer. For example, forums.lanik.us or someguy@list.com.

reportpubliclyavailable.description: Ad report page string, when you're about to submit a report.
reportpubliclyavailable.message: Catatan: laporan anda mungkin akan tersedia untuk umum. Ingatlah itu sebelum anda menyertakan apapun yang bersifat pribadi.

require_restart_browser.description: Text displayed within an option to notify users to restart the browser to fully enable the option

resourcedomain.description: Resource list page: text shown when hovering over an item in the third-party column

resume_blocking_ads.description: Link text to start blocking ads again, displayed immediately after 'AdBlock is paused on this site' or 'AdBlock is paused on all sites'

retryaftersubscribe.description: Instructions on ad report page telling users to subscribe to a filter list and then check again to see whether the ad exists
retryaftersubscribe.message: Berlangganan pada daftar filter ini, lalu coba lagi: $list_title$

safari50_updatenotice.description: A message shown to Safari 5.0 users urging them to upgrade
safari50_updatenotice.message: Anda menggunakan Safari versi lama. Ambillah versi terbaru untuk menggunakan tombol toolbar AdBlock untuk menjeda AdBlock, membebaskan situs web, dan melaporkan iklan. [[Perbaharui sekarang]]

safaributton_how_to_hide2.description: Message explaining how to hide the AdBlock toolbar button. 'Customize Toolbar' should match the text that Safari displays in the toolbar's context menu.
safaributton_how_to_hide2.message: Untuk menyembunyikan tombol, klik kanan toolbar Safari dan pilih Customize Toolbar, kemudian tarik tombol AdBlock dari toolbar. Anda dapat menampilkannya lagi dengan menariknya kembali ke toolbar.

safaricontentblocking.description: Checkbox on the 'General' tab of the Options page. 'Content Blocking' is the name of a different way of blocking resources introduced in Safari 9.

safaricontentblockinglimitexceeded.description: Displayed when the number of rules in the subscribed filter lists is larger than the number supported by Safari Content Blocking, if that option is enabled.
safaricontentblockinglimitexceeded.message: The number of filter list rules exceeds the 50,000 limit, and has been automatically reduced. Please unsubscribe from some filter lists or disable Safari Content Blocking!

safaricontentblockingpausemessage.description: Alert displayed after clicking 'Pause AdBlock' in the AdBlock menu while Safari Content blocking is enabled.
safaricontentblockingpausemessage.message: To pause AdBlock with Content Blocking enabled, please select Safari (in the menu bar) > Preferences > Extensions > AdBlock, and uncheck 'Enable AdBlock'.

safarinotificationbody.description: Body of a notification shown to Safari Content Blocking users with too many filter list rules.
safarinotificationbody.message: Please disable some filter lists. More information in AdBlock's Options.

safarinotificationtitle.description: Title of a notification shown to Safari Content Blocking users with too many filter list rules.

selectlanguage.description: First option in the language dropdown menu on the Filter lists tab. Include the ' -- ' on either side of your translation.

selectlanguage2.description: First option in the language dropdown menu on the Filter lists tab.

settings_changed.description: Part of Options page message letting users know of settings change.
settings_changed.message: In preparation, AdBlock now works differently and some of your settings may have changed.

show_ads_except_for.description: Section title for the whitelisting section of Customize tab
show_ads_except_for.message: Perlihatkan iklan dimanapun kecuali pada domain-domain ini...

show_devtools_panel.description: Checkbox letting user choose whether the AdBlock tab should be displayed in the developer tools window
show_devtools_panel.message: Show 'AdBlock' panel in the developer tools

show_language_options.description: Option to let the user choose AdBlock's display language.
show_language_options.message: Let me choose AdBlock's display language

show_on_adblock_button.description: Checkbox letting user choose whether the toolbar button should show a badge with the number of ads blocked
show_on_adblock_button.message: Tampilkan jumlah iklan yang diblokir di tombol AdBlock

show_on_adblock_menu.description: Checkbox letting user choose whether the AdBlock menu should show the number of ads blocked
show_on_adblock_menu.message: Tampilkan jumlah iklan yang diblokir di menu AdBlock

show_on_button.description: Checkbox letting user choose whether the toolbar button should show a badge with the number of ads blocked
show_on_button.message: Show number of ads blocked on button

show_on_menu.description: Checkbox letting user choose whether the AdBlock menu should show the number of ads blocked
show_on_menu.message: Show number of ads blocked on menu

show_resourcelist.description: Menu entry to open the resource list page

showcontextmenus2.description: Checkbox on the 'General' tab of the Options page.
showcontextmenus2.message: Tambahkan barang ke menu klik kanan

showlinkstolists2.description: Label to display filter list links

sliderexplanation.message: Geser pengatur hingga iklan terblokir dengan benar pada halaman, dan elemen yang terblokir tidak terlihat.

slidertitle.message: Langkah 1: Tentukan apa yang akan diblokir

slows_down_extension.description: Text of an option telling users that the option slows down the extension

solarized_theme.description: Name of a theme in the Themes tab of the Options page

sourcecode.description: Link to the source code of AdBlock on the Support tab

status_domain_paused.description: Message shown in toolbar button when AdBlock is not running on a specific domain
status_domain_paused.message: AdBlock is paused on this site.

status_paused.description: Message shown in toolbar button when AdBlock is not running

status_universal_paused.description: Message shown in toolbar button when AdBlock is not running on all domains
status_universal_paused.message: AdBlock is paused on all sites.

stay_tuned.description: Text in theme box of the Themes tab of the Options page (no more than 30 characters)

storage_quota_exceeded.description: Message shown when the user uses more storage than allowed by the browser.
storage_quota_exceeded.message: Anda melebihi jumlah penyimpanan yang bisa dipakai oleh AdBlock. Batalkanlah langganan anda dari beberapa daftar filter!

subscribebutton.description: Subscribe to a filter list button

subscribeconfirm.description: Prompt question before subscribing to a filter list
subscribeconfirm.message: Apakah Anda yakin bahwa Anda ingin berlangganan ke daftar filter $title$?

sunshine_theme.description: Name of a theme in the Themes tab of the Options page

support_to_unlock.description: Text in theme box of the Themes tab of the Options page (no more than 30 characters)

supportsite.description: Link to the support site on the Support tab

sync_check_status_text.description: message and button text on the Sync sub-tab of the Options page
sync_check_status_text.message: Sync and personalize AdBlock across your extensions  [[Check status]]

sync_device_name_list_updated_at_msg.description: message to users on when the sync page was last updated with the name of the extensions / devices (displayed in locale specific format)

sync_extension_name_placeholder.description: placeholder text in the extension / device name field on the sync page

sync_extension_no_extension_msg.description: message to users on the sync page when the license is unavailable, inactive or a license ID hasn't been returned yet

sync_extension_section_title.description: section title text on the Sync sub-tab of the Options page

sync_header_error_message_menu_part_3.description: part 3 of a message to users on the sync page when initial setup of sync fails for some unknown reason.

sync_header_error_revert_message_part_2.description: part 2 of a message to users on the sync page when sending the sync data fails for some unknown reason.

sync_header_message_error_prefix.description: Start of an sync error message to users on the Options page or AdBlock popup menu.
sync_header_message_error_prefix.message: This extension was out of sync.

sync_header_message_error_suffix.description: Part of an sync error message to users on the Options page or AdBlock popup menu.

sync_header_message_getting_license.description: message to users on the sync page when the extension is getting the license

sync_header_message_in_progress.description: message to users on the options pages when syncing with the server is in progress

sync_header_message_no_license.description: message to users on the sync page when the license is unavailable, inactive or a license ID hasn't been returned yet
sync_header_message_no_license.message: Please give us a few moments to make sync available.

sync_header_message_old_commit_version_c.description: part 2 of a message to users on the sync page when initial setup of sync fails for some unknown reason.
sync_header_message_old_commit_version_c.message: We’ve synced this extension and will revert your changes.

sync_header_message_old_commit_version_c.description: part 3 of a message to users on the sync page when initial setup of sync fails for some unknown reason.
sync_header_message_old_commit_version_c.message: Please copy your custom rules to the clipboard, reload the page, and make your changes again.

sync_header_message_old_commit_version_p.description: part 2 of a message to users on the sync page and popup menu when initial setup of sync fails for some unknown reason.
sync_header_message_old_commit_version_p.message: We’ve synced this extension and reverted your changes.

sync_header_message_old_commit_version_p.description: part 3 of a message to users on the sync page when initial setup of sync fails for some unknown reason.

sync_header_message_setup_fail_part_2.description: message to users on the sync page when initial setup of sync fails for some unknown reason.
sync_header_message_setup_fail_part_2.message: Please try turning on sync again in a few minutes.

sync_header_message_setup_fail_prefix.description: start of error message to users on the sync page when sync fails.

sync_header_message_sync_complete.description: message to users on the option pages when syncing with the server server is complete

sync_message_old_version_part_1.description: button text on the Sync sub-tab of the Options page
sync_message_old_version_part_1.message: You’re using an old version of AdBlock.

sync_message_old_version_part_2.description: button text on the Sync sub-tab of the Options page
sync_message_old_version_part_2.message: Please [[update AdBlock]] so we can sync your settings.

sync_now_btn_text.description: button text on the Sync sub-tab of the Options page

sync_now_message.description: message text in the on the sync page
sync_now_message.message: I will fetch updates automatically; you can also

sync_show_name_text.description: message to users on the sync page when which includes the name of the extension / device

sync_tab_item.description: Title of the Sync sub-tab of the Options page

sync_turn_off_btn_text.description: button text on the Sync sub-tab of the Options page

sync_turn_on_duplicate_name_text.description: error message text on the Sync sub-tab of the Options page
sync_turn_on_duplicate_name_text.message: This extension name is already in use

sync_turn_on_invalid_name_text.description: error message text on the Sync sub-tab of the Options page
sync_turn_on_invalid_name_text.message: Please name this extension to continue

sync_turn_on_text.description: message and button text on the Sync sub-tab of the Options page
sync_turn_on_text.message: Sync and personalize AdBlock across your extensions  [[Turn on sync]]

sync_update_now_section_title.description: section title for the sync now section on the sync page

sync_verify_turn_on_text.description: message text in the extension / device name field on the sync page
sync_verify_turn_on_text.message: Turning on sync will clear existing settings information for this extension.

tabcustomize.description: A tab on the Options page

tabcustomizetitle.description: Title of the Customize tab of the Options page

tabfilterlists.description: A tab on the Options page

tabgeneral.description: A tab on the Options page

tabreloadcomplete.description: On the ad report page, alert notifying users that we've disabled all other extensions
tabreloadcomplete.message: Selesai! Kami memuat ulang halaman dengan iklan. Silakan periksa halaman tersebut untuk melihat apakah iklan hilang. Kemudian kembali ke halaman ini dan menjawab pertanyaan di bawah ini.

tabsupport.description: A tab on the Options page

tabthemes.description: A tab on the Options page

tabtranslations.description: A tab on the Options page

text_body.description: Text in theme box of the Themes tab of the Options page (no more than 22 characters)

themes.description: Title of the Themes tab of the Options page

thirdparty.description: Resource list page: column title telling if the resource originates from a different domain

translator_credit.description: This message will be followed by a list of names of the translators who contributed to the language AdBlock is currently displayed in. Do not add any names to this string.

translator_credit2.description: This message will be followed by a list of names of the translators who contributed to the language AdBlock is currently displayed in. Do not add any names to this string.

translators.description: A link on the Options page / translators tab to a KB article about how to help translate AdBlock
translators.message: Learn more about how to help translate AdBlock [[here]]

troubleshoot_an_ad.description: Entry in the AdBlock button menu

twitch_hiding_option.description: Description of option on General tab of the Options page to hide Twitch ads
twitch_hiding_option.message: Enable hiding of streaming ads on Twitch™

undo_last_block.description: Menu entry to let the user cancel the result of running the blacklist wizard.
undo_last_block.message: Batalkan blok saya pada domain ini

undo_last_block_site.description: Menu entry to let the user cancel the result of running the blacklist wizard.
undo_last_block_site.message: Undo my blocks on this site

unexpected_filter_list_header.message: Daftar saringan header tidak diperbolehkan disini

unpause_adblock.description: Link text to start blocking ads again, displayed immediately after 'AdBlock is paused'

unpause_adblocking.description: Menu entry to unpause the extension (start blocking ads again)

unsubscribe_from_all_confirmation.description: Confirmation message shown to user if they try to unsubscribe from all filter lists. The user will have two options: OK and Cancel.
unsubscribe_from_all_confirmation.message: AdBlock can't block ads if you disable all the filter lists. We recommend pausing AdBlock instead. Unsubscribe from this list anyway?

unsubscribedlabel.description: Status label when unselecting a filter list

updatedtimestamp.description: Label for filter list subscription last updated timestamp

updatenowmessage2.message: Saya akan mengambil pembaharuan secara otomatis; Anda juga dapat melakukan [[pembaharuan sekarang]]

updateyourlists.description: Section header on the ad report page
updateyourlists.message: Pastikan daftar filter Anda telah diperbaharui:

urgent_safari_changes.description: Title for Options page message letting users know of settings change.
urgent_safari_changes.message: URGENT: Apple is changing Safari extensions.

warning_overrules_filters.description: Message on the 'Customize' tab of the options page, explaining the danger of adding a whitelist filter for all websites with only some exceptions.
warning_overrules_filters.message:
Peringatan: pada semua situs lain anda akan melihat iklan!
Hal ini mengesampingkan semua filter lain untuk situs-situs tersebut.

watermelon_theme.description: Name of a theme in the Themes tab of the Options page

whatmakesadblocktick.description: Subtitle on the Support tab. This section contains links to the AdBlock source code and contributors. In this context, 'tick' can be replaced with the word 'work'.

whats_this.description: Text of a link pointing to the explanation of a new feature

whatsnew.description: Link to display the changelog on the Support tab
whatsnew.message: Apa baru dalam rilis terbaru? Lihat [[changelog]]!

whitelist_all_youtube_channels.description: Toolbar button menu entry, displayed only on youtube.com/feed/subscriptions and if the YouTube channel whitelisting option is enabled.

whitelist_youtube_channel.description: Entry in the AdBlock menu, only displayed when a user is browsing YouTube and has enabled the YouTube channel whitelisting option

whitelist_youtube_channel_v2.description: Menu entry to whitelist the channel of the current YouTube video or page. The channel name will appear on a line below this menu item.

whitelistertitle2.description: The title of the whitelist wizard (Don't run on this page/pages on this domain)

wizardcantrunonframesets.description: Alert shown when the user tries to use a blacklist/whitelist wizard on an old website
wizardcantrunonframesets.message: Fitur AdBlock ini tidak bekerja di situs ini karena menggunakan teknologi usang. Anda bisa memasukkannya ke sumber blacklist atau whitelist secara manual di tab 'Customize' halaman pengaturan.

work_around_hulu_problems.description: Advanced Options page checkbox, which users only need to use if Hulu.com videos break. It directs the user to restart their browser in order for changes to the checkbox to take effect.
work_around_hulu_problems.message: Membetulkan video Hulu.com yang tidak bisa dimainkan (harus muat ulang browser anda)

yes.description: A positive response to a question

you_can_slide_to_change.description: Whitelist slider usage instructions. Sometimes only one slider will show, and sometimes two will show, and if possible the text should handle both cases.
you_can_slide_to_change.message: Anda dapat menggeser yang dibawah ini untuk mengganti secara tepat pada halaman apa AdBlock tidak akan berjalan.

you_know_thats_a_bad_idea_right.description: Confirmation message shown to user if they try to subscribe to too many lists. The user will have two options: OK and Cancel.
you_know_thats_a_bad_idea_right.message: Semakin banyak daftar filter yang anda gunakan, semakinlambat AdBlock bekerja. Menggunakan terlalu banyak daftar bahkan dapat membuat browser anda berhenti bekerja pada beberapa situs. Tekan OK untuk tetap berlangganan pada daftar ini.

ytadblockupdates.description: Subtitle on the Support tab. Specific to the 'AdBlock on YouTube' extension.
